page.title: 10COUNCILS
page.content: All aspects of government affect this area although the national and regional decisions seem remote when read about in the newspapers. Current- ly local County and District (South Cambridgeshire) councillors both live in nearby villages and regularly attend the local Parish council meet- ings and seem to be helpful.They have less to do here as this is a rural area with limited facilities and only two small population centres.There is a very high proportion of council housing in West Wickham(40 houses in a population of 350).In both of the villages covered there is a wish by the District Council to build a few bungalows for old people, which would vacate some of the larger houses for families.All the government offices and Social Service departments are a few miles away in the towns.
